headline: ITW Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: GLENVIEW, Ill., Oct. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE: ITW) declared a dividend on the company's common stock of $1.61 per share for the fourth quarter of 2025. The dividend equates to $6.44 per share on a full-year basis. The dividend will be paid on January 9, 2026 to shareholders of record as of December 31, 2025. headline: Generac Q3 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates, 2025 Outlook Revised
summary: GNRC's third-quarter earnings and sales fall short of estimates, with weaker generator demand prompting it to cut the 2025 revenue outlook.

headline: Illinois Tool Works: Q3 - Underwhelming Performance As Well As Outlook
summary: Illinois Tool Works Q3 review: modest growth, margin gains, and inventory risks. Operating margins improved, especially in Auto OEM. See more on ITW stock here.
